page.title: 15Walsingham School 1912
page.content: You attended this school from 5 to 14.The{six classrooms}were heated with{open fires}.There was no canteen so the children either had to bring their own food or go home for it.There was no electricity so you had to use{ {oil lamps}.There used to be long sloping desks and tip_up seats.The teachers desk was very high so he could see the class.There was no hot taps.The big boys had to{pump water} from the well into a tank to last all day.The toilets weren't like modern ones.There was a bucket with a wooden seat on top.One night during the week a{night_cart}came to empty them.The{ {playground}was{gravel}not concrete.There was no school_house.In stead there was a garden and the big boys had to look after it. by Stephanie Glover Age 11
